attributes.action: Ban modification of cars for young drivers under the age of 25
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban modification of cars for young drivers under the age of 25 in the interests of road safety, the health and welfare of young drivers and the nuisance of noise pollution. This would help prevent young drivers from competing against each other and end the noise pollution nuisance of large exhausts. Are the modifications disclosed to insurance companies and if not, are young drivers driving around with invalid insurance? Instigate a maximum car bhp for young drivers.
